attributes.action: make a law banning the microchipping of human beings in U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like a law passed by Parliament banning microchipping in humans.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make a law banning the microchipping of human beings in U.K."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15004.asp

Prime Minister's Office
